data.title: Nick Greiner Faithfulness Lyrics
meta_keywords: download lyrics of Faithfulness by Nick Greiner
Nick Greiner Faithfulness lyrics mp3 download
data.meta_description: Faithfulness lyrics by Nick Greiner, listen and download latest songs of Nick Greiner with lyrics on Boomplay.
data.text:
I'm seeking His face every day

I know that He's the way

I serve the name above every name

He sits on the throne of grace

He is the same and will never change

I give Him all of the praise

He went and paid His life in your place

So that you can be saved yeah

Jesus

He's the reason I'm alive

Yeah, Jesus

Gave me sight when I was blind

Yeah, Jesus

Took me in when it was night

Yeah, Jesus

Is the name I magnify

I had to get off my high horse

And humble myself for the Lord

Back then I thought I was done for

Until I met Jesus, my savior

He taught me how to go love more

And led me when I was in a storm

I get direction from the source

And I listen cause He's my mentor

I was close to giving up

And throwing everything away

Wondering if all my laboring

Was being done in vain

Then one day I heard a voice

That told me I needed more faith

Time to tell this mountain take

A hike a get up out of the way

I know that He's the way

I serve the name above every name

Is the name I magnify

Till I saw the light had to catch some rays

Never woulda thought he would rearrange

And change my life, I just got a clean slate

He came down to intervene

When I was so low like a submarine

Pulled me right up out of the deep

Then He Put me on my feet

Now I'm under His wings like a chickadee

And throwing everything away
